event.title: Info Booth at Lichtenberger Lichtermarkt, Berlin Germany

body.p: On the first Advent, there is a neighborhood Christmas market at the Lichtenberg town hall in Berlin. This year, the Berlin group of the FSFE will be there with an information stand. The market will be open from 13 to 18h, entrance is free.
At the booth you can find the story of Ada and Zangemann, information about the work of the FSFE, warm socks and hot Gl√ºhmate.
